ValidationRule.description: Informed the Customer field is required when assigning to T2 Production/Dev Queue. This will remind the agent to inform the customer about the escalation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = '0128F000000W684QAC', /*Technical Support*/ OR( $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Manager", $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Rep" ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Assign_to_T2__c , "T2 Production"), ISPICKVAL(Assign_to_T2__c, "T2 Developer") ), Informed_Customer__c = false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to inform the customer and select the "Informed customer" checkbox before escalating the case to a T2 Queue
